sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A huge search and rescue operation is underway in the U.S. after a tornado struck several Midwestern states, killing at least 80 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Tighter COVID restrictions introduced by governments have led to several protests across Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Top diplomats from the G7 countries have met in Liverpool to discuss the build-up of Russian troops on Ukraine's border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Jeff Bezos' rocket company has successfully completed its third expedition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: NFL superstar Michael Stratton joined five others on the 10-minute flight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At least 80 people are feared to have been killed in the United States after a tornado tore through several Midwestern states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Six of the victims died when an Amazon warehouse collapsed in Illinois as a result of what commentators are calling one of the largest storm outbreaks in history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: More than 70 people are believed to have died in Kentucky alone, many of them workers at a candle factory struck by the tornado.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Scores of search and rescue workers are spending the weekend sifting through the rubble of homes and businesses searching for survivors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Observers say the tornado was the longest on record, having tracked it touching down for almost 400 kilometers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The last such storm in the region was in March 1925, when a tornado ran over 355 kilometers through Missouri, Illinois and Indiana. This latest event is all the more remarkable coming in December, when colder weather normally limits the impact of tornadoes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: President Joe Biden approved an emergency disaster declaration for Kentucky on Saturday and pledged to support all the affected states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In the Austrian capital Vienna tens of thousands of people took part in a

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: protest after the Freedom Party called for demonstrations against mandatory Covid vaccinations and home confinement for those who haven't yet been jabbed. The party's chief, Herbert Kegel, spoke at the rally and joined in the singing of the country's national anthem.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Spain, thousands of people also marched peacefully through the centre of Madrid on Saturday in protest against the government's approach to the coronavirus. Protesters, flanked by police vans, held banners reading, Fake Pandemic and I Won't Get Vaccinated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And there were similar scenes in Catalonia on Saturday, where thousands turned out on the streets of Barcelona to protest against the introduction of Covid passports in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Close to 90% of people eligible for vaccination have received two doses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Cases have risen, but hospitals are coping so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Further north in Luxembourg, several hundred people also protested over the weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Covid restrictions have been tightened recently to include an obligatory health pass for access to leisure and hospitality premises to prove vaccination or recent recovery.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Any invasion by Russia would be a strategic mistake for which there would be serious consequences. That's according to the British Foreign Secretary Liz Truss and her UK counterpart Anthony Blinken.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The UK has welcomed top diplomats from the world's wealthiest nations to Liverpool to discuss the buildup of Russian troops and weapons on Ukraine's border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And of course, the G7 countries, as the world's leading democracies and economies, need to come together to advance the frontiers of freedom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We need to show a positive, proactive approach in making ourselves safer, more competitive and better able to stand up for the values we believe in.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We need to defend ourselves against the growing threats from hostile actors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Trusts also urge free democratic nations not to rely on Russian gas supplies, such as the Nord Stream 2 pipeline. Foreign ministers will also discuss the coronavirus vaccination campaign during the two-day meeting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Bosnian Serb parliament adopted a declaration on Friday that will weaken the war-ravaged Balkan country's central authority.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Lawmakers vote on starting a procedure for Bosnian Serbs to withdraw from the Bosnian army, security services, tax system and judiciary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Bosnian Serb member of the tripartite Bosnian presidency, Milorad Dodik, said it was a historic parliament session that would strengthen the Bosnian Serb mini-state formed as part of a US-sponsored peace agreement that ended the Bosnian war in 1995.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Despite the fact that it is highly unlikely that the announced changes will come into effect any time soon, there is a fear that the current rhetoric and moves made by the authorities in Republika Srpska could push Bosnia into an even deeper crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: push Bosnia into an even deeper crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: During a ceremony, a member of the Bosnian presidency warned that Dodik's policies are taking the wrong path and called on the US and the EU to crack down on him and his associates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The United States has already imposed a travel ban and other sanctions on Dodik, and both American and German officials have recently threatened more in case bosnian subs further weakened bosnia's central institutions environmental protesters in belgrade have blocked roads for a third consecutive weekend

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: for now the government has abandoned legislation that would enable foreign companies mine lithium further polluting western Serbia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: However critics say the ruling conservatives need to abolish all future lithium excavation projects.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Protesters fear the authorities will inevitably prioritise foreign investment over environmental concerns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: NFL legend Michael Stratton has returned to Earth following a 10-minute space mission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The former New York Giant joined five others aboard the New Shepard capsule, owned by Jeff Bezos' rocket company Blue Origin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This was the company's third passenger flight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The founder of Amazon journeyed on the debut launch in July, while Star Trek actor William Shatner was welcomed on the second.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The reusable automated rocket is aptly named after Alan Shepard, the first American in space.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The astronaut's eldest daughter joined the Super Bowl star for Saturday's expedition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Laura Shepard Churchley packed a tiny piece of her father's Freedom 7 Mercury capsule, as well as a few other keepsakes from his Apollo 14 mission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Whereas the ABC co-host brought a Super Bowl ring, his number 92 jersey and a football along for the ride.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Blue Origin originally planned the launch for Thursday, but high winds forced the crew to postpone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Giant wave surfer Andrew Cotton has been saved from drowning by a fellow surfer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The athlete fell from his board into the water at the Portuguese seaside town of Nazaré, known for its huge waves.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Brit was trapped in the rocks at the foot of the town's iconic lighthouse when Brazilian surfer Marcelo Luna jet-skied out to release him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The water was so aerated I was sort of sinking, so I pulled my unflectable vest and then there was like a moment there I was like, OK, right, this is definitely the worst, you know, this can go, you can go pretty bad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Marcelo said he became aware of Cotton's distress when people started shouting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Then he realized the Brit was stuck dangerously between the rocks and the wave breaks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This place in Nazaré has always been a nightmare for us surfers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We know that. We train hard so that it doesn't happen, but it can happen and it did.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But I'm happy because I was there." Nazaré is one of the world's top spots for giant wave surfing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It is also notorious for how dangerous the waves can be.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As Luna says, what matters is not the surfing, but getting all the surfers home safe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Composed of iconic photographs and new unpublished works, McCurry's images are known for their humanity, dignity, compassion, elegance and proportion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The exhibition in Mayol Museum in Paris takes us on a long journey from Afghanistan to Southeast Asia and from Africa to Latin America.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This vast and fascinating body of work always retains the human element that made his celebrated image of the Afghan girl so powerful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Across from the Kremlin on the banks of the Moskva River, a century-old power plant is transformed by a billionaire gas tycoon into a temple of contemporary art in Moscow and Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The vast interior, more than 35,000 square meters, has both enormous and intimate spaces for exhibitions and events.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The GES2 Art Center was designed by star Italian architect Renzo Piano and promises to house the biggest international names as well as Russian rising stars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Museo Tisn-Bornemisza presents until January 30th the first retrospective devoted to René Magritte to be held in Madrid since 1989.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: With more than 70 works, including paintings and works on paper along with a selection of photographs and films, the exhibition emphasizes the repetitive element present in the work of the great surrealist painter, whose obsessive themes constantly reappear with innumerable variations.
